amendatorysection.para: For purposes of the Health Care Facility Licensure Act, unless the context otherwise requires, the definitions found in sections 71-404 to 71-431 shall apply.

source.note: The Revisor of Statutes has pursuant to section 49-769 correlated LB1052, section 6, with LB1053, section 4, to reflect all amendments.
Changes made by LB1052 became effective November 14, 2020. Changes made by LB1053 became operative January 1, 2021.
